articles.author: Pooja Sitaram Jaiswar
articles.title: Month after Hindenburg's bombshell report, Adani stocks in shambles; group loses over ₹12 lakh cr m-cap | Mint - Mint
articles.description: By end of market hours on Friday, the m-cap of Adani securities was around  ₹7,15,986.97 crore on BSE. This would be a loss of over  ₹12 lakh crore from a market valuation of around  ₹19.2 lakh crore which was seen on January 24.
articles.content: A month after Hindeburg's bombshell report, Adani Group has lost over 12 lakh crore market value on Friday. From the peak level, the losses are even heftier. On January 24, 2023, the Adani Group held… [+5036 chars]

articles.title: Air India to hire over 5,100 cabin crew, pilots after record aircraft deal - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The announcement comes close on the heels of the carrier placing an order to buy 470 aircraft from Boeing and Airbus under deals potentially worth tens of billions of dollars.
articles.content: Air India on Friday announced its plan to hire over 4,200 cabin crew trainees and 900 pilots this year as the airline expands its domestic and international operations. The cabin crew will undergo a … [+1434 chars]
